Text:
function RYU_EP04_19()
    -- .転-5【12月第4週】「悪意に屈せず、前へ前へ」
    SaveData.Title = "悪意に屈せず、前へ前へ"

    -- //BG：校舎前
    --LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG011aa")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

    -- //BG：アキラ宅
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG023aa")

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav")

    -- //BU：アキラ（真剣・部屋着）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ The day of the Princess Election with Daria-san. Akira saw me off at the entrance. ]])

    -- //SE：扉を開く音
PLAY_SE("SEb005.wav")
WAIT(500)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1077.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Serious / Lounging Clothes
 "Minachin, please support Uran-san. You absolutely have to beat that infamous cross-dressing sexual harassment monster." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1899.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Smiling
 "Yeah, leave it to me. I will definitely win against Daria-san and save Marika-nee-san." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- //SE：扉を閉まる音
PLAY_SE("SEb006.wav")
WAIT(300)

    -- 　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //BG：1-A教室
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG014aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ Soon, it would be the sixth period when the Princess Election takes place. ]])

    MSG([[ Uran-san had told me beforehand that she wanted to concentrate alone, so I decided to talk with the 'Knights' until the doors opened. ]])

    -- //BU：ヒユ（驚き）、モブ女子生徒×２
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB06aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB04aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_HIY01ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0453.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】Surprised
 "Eh, Erika-onee-sama... isn’t it okay not to go to Uran-sama?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1900.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Normal
 "Ah, it's fine. She said she wants to be alone, so I plan to enter together with everyone as usual." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //BU：リラ（真剣）、ヒユ（驚き）、モブ女子生徒×２
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB06aa")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,700,0)
    --LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB04aa")
    --LAYER_POSITION(55,-700,0)
    --LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_HIY01ca")
    --LAYER_POSITION(60,300,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_RIR07ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,500,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(65,300,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1367.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Serious
 "Are you dumb or what?! You totally don’t understand a girl’s feelings! You’re as clueless as a dense guy!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1901.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Flustered
 "L-Lira-san!? What do you mean by that!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1368.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Serious
 "I mean exactly that! At times like this, even if she really wants you to come, she’d say 'You don’t have to come'—that’s a girl’s heart!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_HIY01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,-500,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,-300,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0454.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】Serious
 "This time I totally agree with Lira-san. Erika-onee-sama, please go to Uran-sama right away." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB06aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,800,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB04aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-800,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)


PLAY_VOICE("mix_0022")
    MSG([[
    【Knights】
 "Exactly!" ]])

    MSG([[ The entire class nodded in agreement. ]])

    MSG([[ Huh. Could it be that everyone except me agrees? I don’t understand what’s going on at all. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_RIR07fa")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,300,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1369.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Wry smile / Sweat
 "Geez... just hurry up and go, you dense playgirl. You’ve got a good idea where Uran-senpai is, right?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_RIR07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,300,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1370.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Normal
 "Normal girls hate being a burden to the one they like, but if that person puts effort in for them, in the end, they’re happy about it." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_RIR07ia")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,300,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1371.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Wink
 "Uran-senpai will definitely cry tears of joy when she sees Erika’s face. She obviously wants to see you." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01bb")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1902.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Serious
 "I-I understand. I’ll go right away!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I felt the same—I wanted to see her. Trusting Lira-san’s words, I immediately dashed out of the classroom. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029",300,false)

    -- //BG：4F廊下
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013ad")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029" , 300,false)
    -- //BG：3F廊下
    --LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013ac")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)
    -- //BG：2F廊下
    --LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013ab")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)
    -- //BG：1F廊下
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029",300,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029" , 300,false)

    MSG([[ Without hesitation, I ran down to the first floor and headed straight for the Japanese-style room. ]])

    MSG([[ If Uran-san wants to focus, the place would be one familiar to her where no one visits during the day— the Japanese-style room. ]])

    MSG([[ Ignoring the flow of students going outside the school building toward the auditorium for the Princess Election, I pushed forward down the corridor leading to the Japanese-style room. ]])

    MSG([[ Then, at that moment―― ]])

STOP_BGM(1000)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0161.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 "Oh my? Could you be Erika Ikusa?" ]])

    MSG([[ Suddenly called out to, I turned around. There stood a breathtakingly beautiful woman I seemed to recognize from somewhere. ]])

    -- //BU：姫神ネメシア（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_BGM("BGM05.wav")

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0162.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】※Nemesia Normal
 "I’m so glad to meet you~<sprite="Emoji" name="star"> I always hear stories from Hermes about you~<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1903.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Surprised
 "E-Erika-san from Hermes...? Just who are you?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0163.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】※Nemesia Normal
 "Oh my. Haven’t you seen me on TV? I’m still quite something, aren’t I?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0164.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Normal
 "I am Nemesia Himegami, one of the school's directors and also Hermes’s mother~ Please remember me from now on~<sprite="Emoji" name="star">" ]])

    MSG([[ Hearing that name, I finally understood where the familiarity came from. ]])

    MSG([[ Nemesia Himegami is the 'mother' often mentioned by Hermes, a hugely popular actress on TV. ]])

    MSG([[ I don’t know the details, but she used to be a famous idol, and her appearance is so perfect it’s hard to believe she’s a mother of two. ]])

    MSG([[ Her hair glimmers like jewels, her skin is firm, not a wrinkle in sight. She looks artificially beautiful. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0165.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Normal
 "Hehe, why are you so nervous? Don’t worry, I’m not thinking about eating you up or anything." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01qa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0166.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Mocking laugh
 "No, I simply have some questions... like where the rebellious lady of the Ryuguuin family is hiding<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1904.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Surprised
 "Where Uran-san is...!? W-What do you plan to do with that information?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0167.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Mocking laugh
 "What do I plan to do? She’s my daughter’s rival, of course. Meeting her once and greeting her is only natural, don’t you think?" ]])

    MSG([[ That’s a lie. I can believe most people’s words, but I immediately knew this woman was lying. ]])

    MSG([[ Call it brazen. She doesn’t even try to hide her malice. ]])

    MSG([[ Anyway, I felt clear hostility toward Uran-san from this woman. I thought she absolutely couldn’t be allowed to meet her. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0168.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Normal
 "...Why are you so defensive? You’re not the one having a 'martial arts' appeal contest, are you?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1905.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Serious
 "I won’t let you meet Uran-san. Please leave here immediately." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0169.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Normal
 "Hmmmm? I planned to ignore you since I thought you had no power, but you say something like that?" ]])

    -- //BU：姫神ネメシア（真剣）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_MEN01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
    -- //effect：ネメシアのBUがにじり寄るようにアップ

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1906.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Flustered
 "!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Although I was on guard, she rapidly closed the distance. ]])

    MSG([[ I couldn’t even react. I’ve never experienced anything like this, even at the dojo. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0170.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Serious
 "I... hate it when people defy me. No matter if they’re just a little kitten... I want to crush them<sprite="Emoji" name="star">" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG013ae")
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,800,200)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0735.wav")
    MSG([[
    【???】
 "Could you please step away from my important person? Nemesia Himegami." ]])
    -- //ウラン

    MSG([[ Someone I know well stepped between us as if to protect me. ]])

    -- //BU：ウラン（通常）、ネメシア（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG013aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1907.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Surprised
 "U-Uran-san." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01qa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0171.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Mocking laugh
 "Oh my... what a moth flying into the flame. I thought you were a sheltered girl, but you’re quite something~<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0736.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Normal
 "You’re probably trying to threaten her to withdraw, right? I have no intention of talking with you, so please leave quickly." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0172.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Mocking laugh
 "How cold. I just wanted to chat as a director with the students... so sad." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0737.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Serious
 "...Then perhaps you should restrain that overt hostility. It should be easy for someone as skilled as you." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0738.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Serious
 "Your atrocities end here. I will definitely protect Erika-san from your evil hands." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0173.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Mocking laugh
 "You’ll protect her? Don’t tell me you actually think you can beat my Daria~?" ]])

    MSG([[ Hearing Uran-san’s words, Nemesia-san pressed her stomach in pain but laughed out loud. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0174.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Mocking laugh
 "Hyaha, hyahahaha! That’s funny~ If you say that much, I’ll leave you alone. Good luck~<sprite="Emoji" name="star">" ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,600,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    MSG([[ After laughing heartily, Nemesia-san returned to her usual expression and turned her back on us. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0175.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Normal
 "Be prepared." ]])

    MSG([[ One word as she left―― ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0176.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Normal
 "You’ll regret messing up my plan, you pathetic little fish<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- //BU：ウラン（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

    MSG([[ She left us with those chilling words. ]])

STOP_BGM(2000)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1908.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Serious
 "Nemesia Himegami... who exactly is that person?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0739.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Smiling
 "You don’t need to worry, Erika-san. No matter how much such an older person tries to sabotage me, I will not lose." ]])

    MSG([[ Despite that ominous encounter, her bright smile slightly eased my tense heart. ]])

    MSG([[ But no matter what, I couldn’t erase my anxiety about the upcoming Princess Election. ]])

    MSG([[ That evil look from Nemesia-san. Was there some meaning behind Daria-san’s actions not to campaign until the very end...? ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0740.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Normal
 "...It will be alright, Erika-san." ]])

    MSG([[ Uran-san gently held my hand and smiled at me. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG013ae")
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,900,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BUL_RYU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0741.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Smiling
 "As long as you are watching, Erika-san, I won’t yield to anyone." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    -- 　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("RYU_EP04_20")
end
